Anyone have contact info for Lee Sadderwhite?
He was at the Tampa show selling tsuba, but left Saturday.
I know he doesn't have email.

Email me privately. If he is a reclusive sort- I'm fine giving my contact information for someone to give to him. He can call or mail me.

Curran
Sarasota, FL
